CAREER SUMMARY
08/2017-Present NATIONAL PAINTS FACTORIES CO.LTD
Supervise on-site,assessment,inspection and reporting on painting activities to ensure that painting jobs are carried out according to specification and procedures. Cost Estimation,quotation,negotiation order finalisation. Establish contacts and develop relationships with Contracting / firms in order to develop business. Maintained market share of products and cross checking competitors' activity. Actively involved in the New product launches,business assessment development. Prepar CANDIDATE 	ABDUL SAMAD Senior Technical Advisor MENA
PERSONAL DETAILS
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelors of Arts CHHATRAPATI SHAHUJI MAHARAJ UNIVERSITY ,KANPUR
SWAMI VIVEKANAND SUBHARTI UNIVERSITY,MEERUT (HR Marketing)-In progress
Languages
English and Native
CAREER SUMMARY
08/2017-Present NATIONAL PAINTS FACTORIES CO.LTD
Supervise on-site,assessment,inspection and reporting on painting activities to ensure that painting jobs are carried out according to specification and procedures. Cost Estimation,quotation,negotiation order finalisation. Establish contacts and develop relationships with Contracting / firms in order to develop business. Maintained market share of products and cross checking competitors' activity. Actively involved in the New product launches,business assessment development. Preparation Of Technical Reports. Create and updateTechnical Data Sheet and Material in coordination with marketing and R & D. Conduct relevant seminars about product demonstrations to Clients / Consultants / projects / applicators. Analyse competitors products and market painting trends.
08/2016-08/2017 TRICHY TRADING Co.L.L.C(Leading Automotive Paint Trading Company)
Product Comparison Analysis Spray Painting tools Business Development Technical Product Briefing Sales and Branding Providing Expert & Technical Information Application & Technical Product Training Cost Controller Supervision & Leadership Product Assistance to R&D Product Demonstration DeliverTraining & Seminar Digital Marketer.Responsible for technical support in terms products painting process,to all A class Body Shops Using Axalta System. Establish And Optimise Paint Application Parameters. Impart training to Painters and Surface preparatory,Colourmatcher. Product Training Inquickrepair System for A class body shop. Carry out periodical process audit inPaint Shops and publish there report on it,so as to monitor performance and identify need for improvement. Maintain relevant data so as to track cost per panel and identify causes for cost escalation,if any and thus suggest appropriate method to control and improve cost efficiency
AXALTA COATING SYSTEM Chemical Industry (PaintManufacturing) 04/2011-02/2016 Roles included :Digital Marketer Developed several innovative ways to match colours outside and an effective system for ordering materials necessary to complete projects. Maintain a very high customer satisfaction level for work performed. Performed the mixing and matching of paint  Prepare vehicle for painting process by cleaning filling indents and dings and removing any rust. INSTRUMENT HANDLING Colour Database Software X-riteMA-T5 Spectrophotometer Glossmeters Automatic Film Thickness Applicators Cross Hatch Cutter SprayPainting tools etc
COMMENT
Competent & result oriented Automotive Refinish professional with an experience of more than14+Years across Automotive Refinish Roles have included Business Development Sales and Technical Support. While there are stronger candidates there is no doubting his enthusiasm and energy.
Jan Johnston on mob 0044 771 54 88 297
Office 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
